description: Try our easy to follow Italian Chicken Casserole With Potato recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stew & casserole,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Italian Chicken Casserole With Potato Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large flameproof, ovenproof casserole dish over high heat. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes or until well browned on all sides.
Add onion, garlic, potato, carrots and zucchini and cook for 2 minutes.
Sprinkle flour over vegetables and chicken while cooking and continue to cook for a further 2 minutes.

In a jug or bowl stir tomato paste and herbs into 500ml of Campbells stock until evenly mixed then pour over chicken. Bring to the boil, stirring regularly. Cover and bake, for 30 minutes or until chicken and potato is cooked through. Serve with steamed rice.
